Detailed Description

Main class for Object Detection.

Used to send images to darknet_ros and publish XYZ coordinates for detected objects Cup position is published on the "/object_detector/cup_position" topic

void ObjectDetector::detectorCallback ( const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState &  state,
const darknet_ros_msgs::CheckForObjectsResultConstPtr &  result 
)
inline

Detector callback function.

Used as a callback for sendGoal() and publishes the cup position Does K-Means clustering for each Depth image region of interest in order to extract a more precise depth measurement
